03_central_limit_theorem/04_exam3/02_NP_and_bounds_v1

Let random variable \(X\) be normally distributed with mean \(\mu=70\) and standard deviation \(\sigma=5\).


  1. Determine \(P(68.5<X<71.5)\)
  2. Determine \(P(X>76.5)\)
  3. Determine \(x\) such that \(P(X<x)=0.9032\)
  4. Determine \(P(X<71)\)
  5. Determine \(x\) such that \(P(X>x)=0.0548\)
